Game Name : Little Brain
Name : Tiny Brains
Genre: Action Adventure (ACT) game
Game production : Spearhead Games
Game Publisher : 505 Games
Platform: PC
Release date : December 2013
Official Website : http://www.spearheadgames.ca/


Game description

Spearhead Games cooperative puzzle game "little brain (Tiny Brains)" coming soon to PS3, PS4 and PC, the developers did not mention about the Xbox 360 and Xbox One news release , it seems that Microsoft seems to be less of a cup of soup ah . This game is an independent game design studios Spearhead Games header completed works . The game studio is Simon Darveau " Assassin's Creed 3" is a former design director of several " Dead Space 3" consisting of designers .

Players play four animals have super powers in this game , they kept throwing scientists solve various problems . Four of them are creative super power , transmission, power and protection , the player can use these powers in a variety of ways to solve puzzles. For example, the first hurdle, the designers discovered 16 different puzzle solving methods.

Darveau said , " From the beginning we just like making a mutual friend lets players post game in this game , players do not communicate it is impossible to crack the puzzle , players must work together , because everyone has a different super powers while puzzle requires that all super powers combined. because there is no standard answer , then you need to pass the test of whether the player's ability to cooperate . "
